vulnerabilities.title: HashBrown CMS Directory Traversal
vulnerabilities.description: An issue was discovered in HashBrown CMS before 1.3.2. `Server/Entity/Resource/Connection.js` allows an attacker to reach a parent directory via a crafted name or ID field.

vulnerabilities.title: HashBrown CMS RCE
vulnerabilities.description: A remote code execution issue was discovered in HashBrown CMS through 1.3.3. `Server/Entity/Deployer/GitDeployer.js` has a `Service.AppService.exec call` that mishandles the URL, repository, username, and password.
